channel.title: GPU on Compile My Mind
channel.description: Recent content in GPU on Compile My Mind

item.title: RTX 4070 Ti Super vs RX 7900 XT: The Ultimate $800 GPU Showdown
item.description: The $700-900 GPU segment is one of the most competitive in the market, and two heavyweights are battling for supremacy: NVIDIA’s RTX 4070 Ti Super and AMD’s RX 7900 XT. Both cards promise excellent 1440p and 4K gaming performance, but they take different approaches to get there.

item.title: RTX 4080 vs RTX 4080 Super: Is the Super Worth the Upgrade?
item.description: NVIDIA’s RTX 40-series lineup received a mid-generation refresh with the “Super” variants, and the RTX 4080 Super is one of the most interesting updates. Positioned as a replacement for the original RTX 4080, it promises better performance at a lower price point. But is it worth upgrading if you already own an RTX 4080? And which one should you buy if you’re building a new system?
